name: Kristína Gáliková
short_desc_cs: Kristína študuje teoretickú informatiku na University of Glasgow. V Mild Blue sa venuje vývoju backendu a frontendu.
short_desc_en: Kristina studies theoretical computing science at the University of Glasgow. In Mild Blue, she devotes her time to both backend and frontend development.
short_desc_de: Kristina studiert Theoretische Informatik an der University of Glasgow. In Mild Blue entwickelt sie Backend sowohl auch Frontend von unseren Apps.
